attrHeight.name: height
attrHeight.comment: This parameter is used as the initial displacement before the zero_value and height_multiplier are applied.

attrZeroValue.name: zero_value
attrZeroValue.label: zero value
attrZeroValue.comment: This value is added to the displacement before applying the height_multiplier.

attrHeightMultiplier.name: height_multiplier
attrHeightMultiplier.label: height multiplier
attrHeightMultiplier.comment: Multiply the computed (post zero-value) height with this factor.
